name: Ghost rider (itch) (jenkgames)
description:
Ghost rider was made in about 3 hours for Trijam #207: The 3 hour game jam

The game is an infinite runner whereby you drive against the  oncoming traffic. The aim is to collect as many points you can. Points will be collected faster the closer to the top of the screen you drive, thus rewarding you for 'running towards the danger'.  

The game does currently not save your high score. However, do tell me your high score in the comments, i would love to know :D

The game can be played with the keyboard (ASDW or the arrow keys) or a controller (the joystick).
